mapper.update: update user_coupon set coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, use_time = #{useTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, coupon_id, user_id, type_id, status, create_time, use_time from user_coupon
